International Meet & Greet

Travel in comfort from the moment you land  with our complimentary
International Meet & Greet
service. Enjoy priority assistance through arrivals, immigration and baggage claim – ensuring a smooth stress-free airport experience every time you travel.
If you are traveling to Europe, Asia, and the Middle East through one of their 90 busiest airports, make sure to skip the waiting queues with the international meet and assist services by Diamond Air for a smooth and seamless journey, anytime, anywhere.

Immigration Fast Track Services
Unlock 3 complimentary fast track services per year
Skip the
queues
with our complimentary Immigration Fast Track services. Enjoy priority access at immigration counters and expedited clearance, so you can breeze through the airport and start your journey without delays.
Airport Fast Track provides a digital solution enabling cardholders to skip the security queue across top EU, Turkey & Asia airports via pre-booking their priority service through Travel Pass App, making travelling safer, time-saving and more convenient.

Choose from our flexible financial options:
Balance Conversion
Convert your current retail outstanding balance into affordable monthly installments.
Loan on Card within credit limit
Get quick access to cash with your Emirates NBD Credit Card—no paperwork, no hassle.
Installment Payment Plan
Turn all your purchases into easy monthly installments (EMIs). Perfect for big purchases, travel expenses and more.
Balance Transfer
Transfer your Credit Card balance from other Banks to your Emirates NBD Credit Card and enjoy lower interest and smaller monthly payments.
Loan Beyond Credit Limit

metadata.title: Voyager World Elite Credit Card | Emirates NBD

content:
Introducing the new Credit Shield Pro, our enhanced insurance product, underwritten by Abu Dhabi National Insurance Company, that brings you even more benefits and extended coverage.
Key features
0.99% monthly fee of your card's outstanding balance
Up to  300,000 decease cover per cardholder
 100 pay out per day in case of hospitalization
Up to  60,000 job loss cover for up to 12 months or until re-employment
